title: The Thin Line
overview: Tashiro coincidentally meets his best friend Sugimoto in a bar very close to the apartment in which Sugimotoâ€™s wayward wife is found dead. Although Tashiro is not a suspect in the police investigation, he is racked with guilt and confesses to his wife, Masako. In an effort to further relieve his tortured sense of guilt, he then confesses to Sugimoto. Neither his wife nor his friend can believe that he could have been involved.
